name: Nice Holiday
description: The Nice Holiday is extra indulgent.  Pop on Mariah Carey's 'All I Want For Christmas is You!' and enjoy by the fire with a loved one.  From 'Fancy AF Cocktails' by Tom Sandoval and Ariana Madix
directions: Add all ingredients (except the garnish) to a cocktail shaker.
Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with whipped cream, chocolate mints, and a fresh mint leaf.
